alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 6:54PM EDT until June 12 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN HOUSTON AND NORTHEASTERN JACKSON COUNTIES... At 554 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southeast of Cottonwood, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cottonwood, Ashford, Malone, Avon, Gordon, Bascom, Pansey, Crosby, Grangeburg, Lovetown, Sealy Springs, Hornsville, Chattahoochee SP, Lucy, Farley Nuclear Plant and Ellaville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
